header.title: Customizable furniture online
header.description: Design, customize and order your furniture online, ready to be manufactured on demand by specialized workshops.

choose.description: Select the product that best suits your needs. Explore our range of options and find the perfect design.

customize.description: Customize your product with colors, materials and unique details so it reflects your style.

receive.title: Receive
receive.description: Receive your customized product directly at your door, ready to use.

policies.title: Privacy Notice
policies.content:
Dear clients and visitors of {empresa}:

At {empresa} we understand the importance of protecting the personal data of our clients and visitors (hereinafter ‚ÄúThe Holders‚Äù), which is why we commit to handle it lawfully, confidentially, and in compliance with the Federal Law on the Protection of Personal Data Held by Private Parties and other applicable regulations.

DATA CONTROLLER
{empresaLegal}, located at {domicilioEmpresa}, is responsible for collecting, using, and protecting the personal data of The Holders.

CONSENT OF THE HOLDER
It will be considered that The Holders have granted their consent if they do not expressly object to this Notice.

PERSONAL DATA SUBJECT TO PROCESSING
We may collect data such as: full name, email, phone number, address, RFC (for invoicing), payment details, as well as access information to {sitioWeb}. We do not collect sensitive data unless strictly necessary for the provision of services.

PURPOSES OF THE PROCESSING
The data may be used for:
1) Provision of services and commercialization of {empresa} products.
2) Creation and administration of accounts in {sitioWeb}.
3) Processing of orders, payments, and invoicing.
4) Customer service (complaints, inquiries, returns).
5) Compliance with legal obligations.

Secondarily, we may use the data to send promotions, surveys, event invitations, and advertising related to {empresa}.

DATA TRANSFER
The data may be shared with:
- Business partners and authorized providers for service provision.
- Banking institutions to process payments.
- Competent authorities when required by law.

ARCO RIGHTS
The Holders may exercise their rights of Access, Rectification, Cancellation, and Opposition (ARCO) by sending an email to {correoDatosPersonales}.

MODIFICATIONS
{empresa} may modify this Notice at any time. Updates will be published on {sitioWeb}.

CONTACT
üìß {correoDatosPersonales}
üìç {domicilioEmpresa}

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.content:
Welcome to {empresa}.

By using our website {sitioWeb}, you agree to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use the site or provide your data.

I. General provisions
{empresaLegal}, located at {domicilioEmpresa}, operates this website {sitioWeb}. This site aims to provide information about our products and services, as well as opportunities for contact and lead generation.

All content, including texts, images, logos, and trademarks, is the property of {empresaLegal} and is protected by law. Reproduction or use without authorization is not allowed.

II. User obligations
- Provide truthful and complete information in the site‚Äôs forms.
- Do not spread viruses, malware, or illegal content.
- Do not use third-party information without authorization.
- Use the site only for legal purposes and in good faith.

III. Use of personal data
The use of your personal data is governed by our Privacy Notice. By submitting your data through the site, you agree that we process it for purposes of contact, information delivery, and lead generation.

IV. Modifications
{empresa} may update these Terms and Conditions at any time. Modifications will be published on {sitioWeb} and will become effective upon publication.

V. Contact
For any questions or comments about these Terms and Conditions, you can contact us at {correoContacto}.
